movie.managementWS.web.service

Interface MovieManagement

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MovieManagementImpl

    public interface MovieManagement
    Interface where the functions related to the service are defined.
    Author:
    Micael DUPUIS and Maxime PINNA.

      • addMovie

        int addMovie(Movie m)
        Used to add a Movie in the list listMovies.
        Parameters:
        m. - The movie that will be added.
        Returns:
        The movie that has been added.

      • addActor

        int addActor(Actor a)
        Used to add an Actor in the list listActors.
        Parameters:
        a. - The actor that will be added.
        Returns:
        The actor that has been added.

      • linkActorToMovie

        int linkActorToMovie(java.lang.String title_movie,
                     java.lang.String name_actor)
        Used to link an Actor to a Movie.
        Parameters:
        title_movie. - Title of the targeted movie.
        name_actor. - Name of the actor.
        Returns:
        If the connection has been made.

      • getMovieInfo

        Movie getMovieInfo(java.lang.String title)

        title. - Title of the targeted movie.
        Returns:
        The targeted Movie.
